snippet: Criminal inquiries are underway as investigators search for the cause of a disaster at the Russian military’s main training center for airborne forces.
abstract: Death toll in collapse of Russian military barracks rises to 23 people, with at least another 22 injured; officials say investigations into disaster are underway.
lead_paragraph: Criminal inquiries are underway as investigators search for the cause of a disaster at the Russian military’s main training center for airborne forces.

headline.main: Russia Says 23 Are Now Dead After Collapse of Barracks
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Russia: 23 Dead in Barracks Disaster at Elite Base
